Send any file of any size directly from your Chrome browser with Gmail!

With the TransferNow extension for Chrome, forget about size limits for your attachments in Gmail. Simplify file transfer without overloading your inbox or that of your recipients, while enhancing your image or that of your company.

Why choose the TransferNow extension for Chrome and Gmail?

‚Äì Send files of all types and sizes: Don't worry about Gmail's size restrictions.
‚Äì Stay informed about downloads: Receive notifications when your files are downloaded.
‚Äì Control the data you send: Manage access to your files with ease.
‚Äì Enhance your image: Personalize your transfers to suit your image!

How does the TransferNow extension for Chrome and Gmail work?

From your Chrome browser, click on the "TransferNow" button at the top right of your screen, or click directly on the "TransferNow" button available when you write a new message from Gmail.

The side panel opens, prompting you to log in to your account. Once logged in, select one or more files to send, or select a folder.

Customize your transfer: set a subject, create a personalized link, password-protect file access, enable download notifications, preview and stream files before uploading, and more.

Click on "Transfer" to start sending your files. Once the transfer is complete and the security check has been carried out, you'll get a link to copy and paste or insert directly into your new Gmail message.

That's it! Send your email with your file download link üöÄ

Compatibility : The TransferNow extension for Chrome is compatible with Gmail and can be used with any Gmail account. A TransferNow account is required to use this extension.

You can also create download links for your files outside Gmail.

If you don't have a TransferNow account yet, check out our offers here => https://www.transfernow.net/en/prices
